_comment: Response when an action is blocked - kernel explains why and how to fix
_action_comment: The action that was attempted: APPROVE_DEAL, FINALIZE_CLOSING, etc.
_status_comment: BLOCKED means action cannot proceed; ALLOWED means it can

reasons._type_comment: Reason types: MISSING_MATERIAL, INSUFFICIENT_TRUTH, AUTHORITY, APPROVAL_THRESHOLD
reasons._requiredTruth_comment: Minimum truth level needed: DOC (documentary) > HUMAN (attested) > AI (inferred)
reasons._currentTruth_comment: Current truth level of the material (null means material doesn't exist)

nextSteps._description_comment: What to do to unblock this action
nextSteps._canBeFixedByRoles_comment: Roles that can perform this fix
nextSteps._canBeOverriddenByRoles_comment: Roles that can override (skip) this requirement
